content: this cowl is crocheted with bulky yarn and an extra big hook to make a squishy drapey and warm cowl it fits close around the neck without being tight and is extra tall for pulling up to keep even your ears and face warm sure to keep your neck warm no matter what winter throws at you think this would be cute as an infinity cowl too just start with double or more stitches and work to desired height when wrapped it would show off both sides of this simple but lovely stitch since there is no pattern repeat it s super easy to adjust the size to customize it supplies 2 skeins cascade 128 model done in color #1910 size p or q crochet hook mine was 12mm somewhere in between finished size 20 circumference x 14 ½ tall
